results.deck: Former Sega development studio known for designing Skies of Arcadia and Shinobi.
results.description: A former Sega development group that had designed games in the Streets of Rage, Phantasy Star and Sakura Taisen series of games. Overworks also developed Skies of Arcadia and Shinobi before being merged with another Sega development studio, WOW Entertainment, forming Sega WOW.
results.name: Overworks

game.name: Sakura Taisen 3: Pari wa Moete iru ka?
